meanings.sent1: The allee in the park was a peaceful place for a stroll.
meanings.sent2: We walked down the allee, enjoying the shade from the trees.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels in the allee seemed to be having a meeting under the trees.
meanings.sent4: The allee stretched out like a green tunnel, inviting us to explore.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight filtering through the trees in the allee created a magical atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The grand estate had an impressive allee leading up to the mansion.
meanings.sent2: Cars drove slowly along the allee, admiring the symmetry of the trees.
meanings.sent3: The allee looked like a row of soldiers standing at attention.
meanings.sent4: The allee stood tall and proud, like a natural cathedral.
meanings.sent5: The allee whispered secrets of the past to those who walked beneath its branches.
